name: Angel Town 1 - RTS Games
description:
【$2.99----->free】
◆2nd Anniversary(○^～^○),$2.99----->free!
◆Experience a revolution in real-time strategy game! Download now and play for free!

【Features】
◆High-paced real-time strategy game
◆9 different angels fight for you
◆30 unique levels
◆4 battle modes: PK, BOSS, TD, PVE
◆PVP, take your angels to the arena and go head-to-head against your friends
◆Beat back hordes of vicious foes
◆Fight until you reach the top of the standings
◆Colorful, vivid HD graphics and animations
◆Stunning visuals and gorgeous animations and effects
◆Fun and addictive
◆Easy to learn, hard to master
◆Control optimized for mobile devices
◆Game Center support.Connect with Game Center to find friends and compare high scores

【Device Compatibility】
◆iPhone4/4s/5/5c/5s/6/6plus/6s/6s plus
◆iPad 2/The new iPad/iPad with Retina display/iPad Air/iPad Air 2/iPad Pro
◆iPad mini 2/3/4
◆iPod touch 4/5

【Feedback】
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

◆This game is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
